A '''Local Specialty''', sometimes called a '''regional specialty'''<!-- lowercase intentional -->, is a [[material]] that is primarily found in a particular [[region]] in [[Teyvat]] and is indicated as such in its description e.g., "Local Specialty (Mondstadt)".

After a local specialty is harvested, it will [[Reset#Other Resets|respawn]] after 46 hours.
